Title: Act as If
Writer: Ray McKinnon (created by), Victoria Morrow, Chad Feehan (executive story editor), Coleman Herbert (executive story editor), Scott Teems (story)
Actors: Aden Young, Abigail Spencer, J. Smith-Cameron, Adelaide Clemens
Plot: Daniel encounters an unusual local entrepreneur; Amantha struggles with a new role; Ted, Sr.'s patience is tested; Tawney makes a decision.
